This modernizr package was built from the Modernizr Download page at http://modernizr.com/download/

Boxes that were checked include:

CSS3
  [ALL]

HTML5
  [ALL]

MISC
  [ALL]

Extra
  Add CSS Classes

Extensibility
  [ALL]

Non-core detects
  css-calc

Build URL:
  http://modernizr.com/download/#-fontface-backgroundsize-borderimage-borderradius-boxshadow-flexbox-flexboxlegacy-hsla-multiplebgs-opacity-rgba-textshadow-cssanimations-csscolumns-generatedcontent-cssgradients-cssreflections-csstransforms-csstransforms3d-csstransitions-applicationcache-canvas-canvastext-draganddrop-hashchange-history-audio-video-indexeddb-input-inputtypes-localstorage-postmessage-sessionstorage-websockets-websqldatabase-webworkers-geolocation-inlinesvg-smil-svg-svgclippaths-touch-webgl-cssclasses-addtest-prefixed-teststyles-testprop-testallprops-hasevent-prefixes-domprefixes-css_calc

If you need to add tests from the official distribution, or otherwise need to upgrade modernizr, make sure you include all the features listed above in this readme file AND update the readme file to include the features you require.
